txt.en:
'The corrupted trees must be purged out of the southern Barrow-downs but they may yet return to the natural fold. To determine this, I will need their seeds.

'Collect their seeds and return them to me. If they can be saved, I will see that the seeds are brought to a place where they can grow into natural creatures once again.

'You will find the corrupted trees deep within the southern Barrow-downs where the walls of the Old Forest are too thick to pass beyond.'

'Yes, it appears that some of these seeds are not destroyed or marred by corruption.\n\n'It is possible that they will grow strong and true and return to nature one day. I thank you for what you have done, [placeholder].'
'Search far to the south where the Barrow-downs meet the Old Forest. You will find the trees bearing the seeds I require in the shadow of the great forest.'
Bob Redthistle believes that the trees of the Old Forest in the southern Barrow-downs may yet be saved after a fashion.
Bring the seeds to Bob Redthistle

There are corrupted trees from the Old Forest in the southern Barrow-downs. Bob Redthistle is at the Dead Man's Perch.\n\nBob Redthistle has asked you to collect seeds from the corrupted trees in the Barrow-downs and return them to him.
